00017 const Argument::mapped_type MappingUtils::cMinNotFound =  std::numeric_limits<Argument::mapped_type>::infinity();

00020 const ConstMapping* MappingUtils::createCompatibleMapping(const ConstMapping& src, const ConstMapping& dst){
00021   typedef FilledUpMapping::KeySet KeySet;
00022   typedef FilledUpMapping::KeyMap KeyMap;
00023 
00024   KeyMap                                     DimensionIndizes;
00025 
00026   const DimensionSet&                        srcDims    = src.getDimensionSet();
00027   const DimensionSet&                        dstDims    = dst.getDimensionSet();
00028 
00029   const DimensionSet::const_iterator         srcDimsEnd = srcDims.end();
00030   const DimensionSet::const_reverse_iterator dstDimsEnd = dstDims.rend();
00031   for (DimensionSet::const_reverse_iterator  dstDimIt   = dstDims.rbegin(); dstDimIt != dstDimsEnd; ++dstDimIt) {
00032     if(srcDims.find(*dstDimIt) == srcDimsEnd) {
00033       DimensionIndizes.insert(DimensionIndizes.end(), KeyMap::value_type(*dstDimIt, KeySet()));
00034     }
00035   }
00036 
00037   if(DimensionIndizes.empty())
00038     return &src;
00039 
00040   ConstMappingIterator* dstIt = dst.createConstIterator();
00041 
00042   if(!dstIt->inRange()){
00043     delete dstIt;
00044     return &src;
00045   }
00046 
00047   const KeyMap::iterator keysEnd = DimensionIndizes.end();
00048   do {
00049     for (KeyMap::iterator keyDimIt = DimensionIndizes.begin(); keyDimIt != keysEnd; ++keyDimIt) {
00050       keyDimIt->second.insert(dstIt->getPosition().getArgValue(keyDimIt->first));
00051     }
00052 
00053     if(!dstIt->hasNext())
00054       break;
00055     dstIt->next();
00056   } while(true);
00057 
00058   delete dstIt;
00059 
00060   return new FilledUpMapping(&src, dstDims, DimensionIndizes);
00061 }
00062 
00063 bool MappingUtils::iterateToNext(ConstMappingIterator* it1, ConstMappingIterator* it2){
00064   bool it1HasNext = it1->hasNext();
00065   bool it2HasNext = it2->hasNext();
00066 
00067   if(it1HasNext || it2HasNext){
00068     if(it1HasNext && (!it2HasNext || it1->getNextPosition() < it2->getNextPosition())){
00069       it1->next();
00070       it2->iterateTo(it1->getPosition());
00071 
00072     } else {
00073       it2->next();
00074       it1->iterateTo(it2->getPosition());
00075     }
00076 
00077     return true;
00078   } else {
00079     return false;
00080   }
00081 }
00082 
00083 Mapping* MappingUtils::createMapping(const DimensionSet& domain, Mapping::InterpolationMethod intpl) {
00084   assert(domain.hasDimension(Dimension::time));
00085 
00086   if(domain.size() == 1){
00087     switch(intpl){
00088     case Mapping::LINEAR:
00089       return new TimeMapping<Linear>();
00090       break;
00091     case Mapping::NEAREST:
00092       return new TimeMapping<Nearest>();
00093       break;
00094     case Mapping::STEPS:
00095       return new TimeMapping<NextSmaller>();
00096       break;
00097     }
00098     return 0;
00099   } else {
00100     switch(intpl){
00101     case Mapping::LINEAR:
00102       return new MultiDimMapping<Linear>(domain);
00103       break;
00104     case Mapping::NEAREST:
00105       return new MultiDimMapping<Nearest>(domain);
00106       break;
00107     case Mapping::STEPS:
00108       return new MultiDimMapping<NextSmaller>(domain);
00109       break;
00110     }
00111     return 0;
00112   }
00113 }
00114 
00115 Mapping* MappingUtils::createMapping(Mapping::argument_value_cref_t outOfRangeVal, const DimensionSet& domain, Mapping::InterpolationMethod intpl) {
00116   assert(domain.hasDimension(Dimension::time));
00117 
00118   if(domain.size() == 1){
00119     switch(intpl){
00120     case Mapping::LINEAR:
00121       return new TimeMapping<Linear>(outOfRangeVal);
00122       break;
00123     case Mapping::NEAREST:
00124       return new TimeMapping<Nearest>(outOfRangeVal);
00125       break;
00126     case Mapping::STEPS:
00127       return new TimeMapping<NextSmaller>(outOfRangeVal);
00128       break;
00129     }
00130     return 0;
00131   } else {
00132     switch(intpl){
00133     case Mapping::LINEAR:
00134       return new MultiDimMapping<Linear>(domain, outOfRangeVal);
00135       break;
00136     case Mapping::NEAREST:
00137       return new MultiDimMapping<Nearest>(domain, outOfRangeVal);
00138       break;
00139     case Mapping::STEPS:
00140       return new MultiDimMapping<NextSmaller>(domain, outOfRangeVal);
00141       break;
00142     }
00143     return 0;
00144   }
00145 }

00206 Mapping::argument_value_t MappingUtils::findMax(const ConstMapping& m, Argument::mapped_type_cref cRetNotFound /*= cMaxNotFound*/) {
00207   ConstMappingIterator*     it       = m.createConstIterator();
00208   bool                      bIsFirst = true;
00209   Mapping::argument_value_t res;
00210 
00211   while(it->inRange()){
00212     Mapping::argument_value_cref_t val = it->getValue();
00213     if(bIsFirst || val > res) {
00214       res      = val;
00215       bIsFirst = false;
00216     }
00217 
00218     //std::cerr << "findMax(): " << val << " @ " << it->getPosition() << "; max is now: " << res << std::endl;
00219     if(!it->hasNext())
00220       break;
00221 
00222     it->next();
00223   }
00224   delete it;
00225   if (bIsFirst) {
00226     // no maximum available, maybe map is empty
00227     return cRetNotFound;
00228   }
00229   return res;
00230 }
00231 
00232 Mapping::argument_value_t MappingUtils::findMax(const ConstMapping& m, const Argument& pRangeFrom, const Argument& pRangeTo, Argument::mapped_type_cref cRetNotFound /*= cMaxNotFound*/){
00233   const DimensionSet& rDimSet = m.getDimensionSet();
00234   //the passed interval should define a value for every dimension
00235   //of the mapping.
00236   assert(pRangeFrom.getDimensions().isSubSet(rDimSet));
00237   assert(pRangeTo.getDimensions().isSubSet(rDimSet));
00238 
00239   ConstMappingIterator*     it       = m.createConstIterator(pRangeFrom);
00240   bool                      bIsFirst = true;
00241   Mapping::argument_value_t res;
00242 
00243   //std::cerr << "findMax(m, " << pRangeFrom << ", " << pRangeTo << "): Map is" << std::endl << m;
00244   if (it->inRange()) {
00245     res      = it->getValue();
00246     bIsFirst = false;
00247     //std::cerr << "findMax(...):  " << " @ " << it->getPosition() << "; max is at beginning: " << res << std::endl;
00248   }
00249   while(it->hasNext() && it->getNextPosition().compare(pRangeTo, &rDimSet) < 0){
00250     it->next();
00251 
00252     const Argument& next    = it->getPosition();
00253     bool            inRange = pRangeFrom.getTime() <= next.getTime() && next.getTime() <= pRangeTo.getTime();
00254     if(inRange) {
00255       const Argument::const_iterator itAEnd = next.end();
00256       for(Argument::const_iterator itA = next.begin(); itA != itAEnd; ++itA) {
00257         if(pRangeFrom.getArgValue(itA->first) > itA->second || itA->second > pRangeTo.getArgValue(itA->first)) {
00258           inRange = false;
00259           break;
00260         }
00261       }
00262     }
00263     if(inRange) {
00264       Mapping::argument_value_cref_t val = it->getValue();
00265       if(bIsFirst || val > res) {
00266         res      = val;
00267         bIsFirst = false;
00268       }
00269       //std::cerr << "findMax(...): " << val << " @ " << it->getPosition() << "; max is now: " << res << std::endl;
00270     }
00271   }
00272   it->iterateTo(pRangeTo);
00273   if (it->inRange()) {
00274     Mapping::argument_value_cref_t val = it->getValue();
00275     if(bIsFirst || val > res) {
00276       res      = val;
00277       bIsFirst = false;
00278     }
00279     //std::cerr << "findMax(...): " << val << " @ " << it->getPosition() << "; max is finally: " << res << std::endl;
00280   }
00281   delete it;
00282   if (bIsFirst) {
00283     // no minimum available
00284     return cRetNotFound;
00285   }
00286   return res;
00287 }

00289 Mapping::argument_value_t MappingUtils::findMin(const ConstMapping& m, Argument::mapped_type_cref cRetNotFound /*= cMinNotFound*/) {

00291   bool                      bIsFirst = true;
00292   Mapping::argument_value_t res;

00295     Mapping::argument_value_cref_t val = it->getValue();

00299     }
00300 
00301     //std::cerr << "findMin(): " << val << " @ " << it->getPosition() << "; min is now: " << res << std::endl;
00302     if(!it->hasNext())
00303       break;
00304 
00305     it->next();
00306   }
00307   delete it;
00308   if (bIsFirst) {
00309     // no minimum available, maybe map is empty
00310     return cRetNotFound;
00311   }

00315 Mapping::argument_value_t MappingUtils::findMin(const ConstMapping& m, const Argument& pRangeFrom, const Argument& pRangeTo, Argument::mapped_type_cref cRetNotFound /*= cMinNotFound*/) {
00316   const DimensionSet& rDimSet = m.getDimensionSet();
00317   //the passed interval should define a value for every dimension
00318   //of the mapping.
00319   assert(pRangeFrom.getDimensions().isSubSet(rDimSet));
00320   assert(pRangeTo.getDimensions().isSubSet(rDimSet));
00321 
00322   Mapping::argument_value_t res;
00323   bool                      bIsFirst = true;
00324   ConstMappingIterator*     it       = m.createConstIterator(pRangeFrom);
00325 
00326   //std::cerr << "findMin(m, " << pRangeFrom << ", " << pRangeTo << "): Map is" << std::endl << m;
00327   if (it->inRange()) {
00328     res      = it->getValue();
00329     bIsFirst = false;
00330     //std::cerr << "findMin(...):  " << " @ " << it->getPosition() << "; min is at beginning: " << res << std::endl;
00331   }
00332   while(it->hasNext() && it->getNextPosition().compare(pRangeTo, &rDimSet) < 0) {
00333     it->next();
00334 
00335     const Argument& next    = it->getPosition();
00336     bool            inRange = pRangeFrom.getTime() <= next.getTime()  && next.getTime() <= pRangeTo.getTime();
00337     if(inRange) {
00338       const Argument::const_iterator itAEnd = next.end();
00339       for(Argument::const_iterator itA = next.begin(); itA != itAEnd; ++itA) {
00340         if(pRangeFrom.getArgValue(itA->first) > itA->second || itA->second > pRangeTo.getArgValue(itA->first)) {
00341           inRange = false;
00342           break;
00343         }
00344       }
00345     }
00346     if(inRange) {
00347       Mapping::argument_value_cref_t val = it->getValue();
00348       if(bIsFirst || val < res) {
00349         res      = val;
00350         bIsFirst = false;
00351       }
00352       //std::cerr << "findMin(...): " << val << " @ " << it->getPosition() << "; min is now: " << res << std::endl;
00353     }
00354   }
00355   it->iterateTo(pRangeTo);
00356   if (it->inRange()) {
00357     Mapping::argument_value_cref_t val = it->getValue();
00358     if(bIsFirst || val < res) {
00359       res      = val;
00360       bIsFirst = false;
00361     }
00362     //std::cerr << "findMin(...): " << val << " @ " << it->getPosition() << "; min is finally: " << res << std::endl;
00363   }
00364   delete it;
00365   if (bIsFirst) {
00366     // no minimum available
00367     return cRetNotFound;
00368   }
00369   return res;
00370 }

00372 
00373 void MappingUtils::addDiscontinuity(Mapping* m,
00374                                     const Argument& pos, Mapping::argument_value_cref_t value,
00375                                     simtime_t_cref limitTime, Mapping::argument_value_cref_t limitValue)
00376 {
00377   // asserts/preconditions
00378   // make sure the time really differs at the discontinuity
00379   assert(limitTime != pos.getTime());
00380 
00381   // add (pos, value) to mapping
00382   m->setValue(pos, value);
00383 
00384   // create Argument limitPos for the limit-position, i.e. copy pos and set limitTime as its time
00385   Argument limitPos = pos;
00386   limitPos.setTime(limitTime);
00387 
00388   // add (limitPos, limitValue) to mapping
00389   m->setValue(limitPos, limitValue);
00390 }
00391 
00392 simtime_t MappingUtils::pre(simtime_t_cref t)
00393 {
00394   assert(SIMTIME_RAW(t) > SIMTIME_RAW(SIMTIME_ZERO));
00395 
00396   simtime_t stPre = SIMTIME_ZERO;
00397   stPre.setRaw(SIMTIME_RAW(t) - 1);
00398 
00399   return stPre;
00400 }
00401 
00402 simtime_t MappingUtils::post(simtime_t_cref t)
00403 {
00404   assert(SIMTIME_RAW(t) < SIMTIME_RAW(MAXTIME));
00405 
00406   simtime_t stPost = SIMTIME_ZERO;
00407   stPost.setRaw(SIMTIME_RAW(t) + 1);
00408 
00409   return stPost;
00410 }

00436 LinearIntplMappingIterator::LinearIntplMappingIterator(ConstMappingIterator* leftIt, ConstMappingIterator* rightIt, Mapping::argument_value_cref_t f):
00437   MappingIterator(), leftIt(leftIt), rightIt(rightIt), factor(f) {
00438 
00439   assert(leftIt->getPosition() == rightIt->getPosition());

00442 LinearIntplMappingIterator::~LinearIntplMappingIterator() {

00445   if(rightIt)
